scripts.build: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile --network polkadotHubTestnet
scripts.deploy:royalties-registry: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/RoyaltiesRegistry.ts --network polkadotHubTestnet --parameters ignition/parameters/royaltiesRegistry.json
scripts.deploy:transfer-proxies: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/TransferProxies.ts --network polkadotHubTestnet --parameters ignition/parameters/transferProxies.json
scripts.deploy:exchange-v2: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/ExchangeV2.ts --network polkadotHubTestnet --parameters ignition/parameters/exchangeV2.json
scripts.deploy:erc721-token: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/ERC721Token.ts --network polkadotHubTestnet --parameters ignition/parameters/erc721Token.json
scripts.deploy:erc1155-token: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/ERC1155Token.ts --network polkadotHubTestnet --parameters ignition/parameters/erc1155Token.json
scripts.deploy:exchange-wrapper: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/ExchangeWrapper.ts --network polkadotHubTestnet --parameters ignition/parameters/exchangeWrapper.json
scripts.set:protocol-fee: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/SetProtocolFee.ts --network polkadotHubTestnet --parameters ignition/parameters/setProtocolFee.json
